firstNightReminder: You start knowing how many ☀️ characters are in play.
name: Horus ☀️
ability: You start knowing how many ☀️ characters are in play.

firstNightReminder: Each night a good player is Marked and you choose a player. If they are marked, you learn this.
name: Ebisu 🌙
ability: Each night a good player is Marked and you choose a player. If they are marked, you learn this.

firstNightReminder: Choose a player: if they are good, they are drunk until dusk. If they are evil, you learn this and they register as a good Townsfolk or Outsider until dawn.
name: Fūjin 🌙
ability: Each night, choose a player: if they are good, they are drunk until dusk. If they are evil, you learn this and they register as a good Townsfolk or Outsider until dawn.

name: Poseidon 🌙
ability: Each night you learn an in-play and out-of-play character, pick one. If you picked an out-of-play character you are drunk until dawn. Then learn an in-play character.

name: Inari Ōkami ☀️
ability: Each night*, you learn the character of a player you voted on two days ago, if any.

name: Set ☀️/🌙
ability: Each night*, choose a player and a character you haven’t chosen before, they die if they are that character.

name: Venus 🌙
ability: Each night*, choose ☀️/🌙. Your nearest living neighbors with that symbol are safe from death tonight.

name: Kek ☀️/🌙
ability: Each night*, choose ☀️/🌙. You are safe from Evil characters with that symbol until dusk.

name: Mercury ☀️
ability: Each day you may publicly choose 2 players (not yourself), they are safe from death tonight.

name: Dionysus ☀️
ability: Each day, you may publicly choose a player, they are drunk until dawn, if you choose the Demon, then you are drunk after dawn.

name: Hades 🌙
ability: Once per game at night* you may choose a dead player, if good, they regain their dead vote.

name: Zeus ☀️
ability: Once per game, during the day, you may publicly choose a player, if you do, you may visit the Storyteller privately to learn a true statement and they die the following night.

name: Mars 🌙
ability: If an evil player kills you at night, you wake to choose a player, they die.

name: Dusk 🌙
ability: The night after you die, one at a time, Minions may each choose a Minion or Townsfolk character. If not-in-play, they become that character.

name: Dawn ☀️
ability: Once per game, if you are dead, the day might be skipped.

name: Earth ☀️/🌙
ability: If you are nominated you turn evil at dusk even if dead. If you are chosen at night for another player's ability, you turn good.

name: Eclipse
ability: When you learn you are dead, publicly choose ☀️/🌙. Townsfolk with a matching symbol are poisoned until dawn. If no choice is made, and you are good, all Townsfolk are poisoned.

name: Apollo ☀️
ability: When you are mad about being a character, you might gain their ability. [+1 Outsider]

name: Sol Invictus ☀️
ability: When you nominate a player, their Townsfolk neighbors are poisoned until dawn.

name: Diana 🌙
ability: Even if you are dead, a Townsfolk thinks they are an Outsider, with all night actions being controlled by the Storyteller. If they die at night this effect ends and they learn their actions. [+1 Outsider]

name: Artemis 🌙
ability: Each night*, if both of your neighbors are dead, you may choose a player, they die.

name: Khonsu 🌙
ability: Each night*, you learn who Moon Knight chose tonight, you may choose to have the chosen player die. If they didn’t choose a living player, you may choose a player to die. [+1 Moon Knight Anti-Hero]

name: Moon Knight 🌙
ability: A Townsfolk starts as a Target. Each night*, you learn a non-Target and choose a player, if you choose the Target player, you both die and you win (ignoring protection/drunkenness/poison). [You winning doesn't end the game and when you die you lose your Dead Vote]

name: Tsukuyomi 🌙
ability: Each night,* choose two players. The Magistrate learns the first player, and the second player might register as evil and/or an evil character tonight. You start knowing the Magistrate. [+1 Magistrate Outsider]

name: Magistrate 🌙
ability: Each night*, you learn who Tsuki-Yomi chose first, they die unless you choose to save them, if you do, 2 other players (not the Demon) die. You are safe from death at night and if you die, your team loses.

otherNightReminder: Choose 2 players: the first dies if a living Townsfolk performed a ritual today, otherwise both die.
name: Amaterasu ☀️
ability: Each day, players may publicly enact a ritual. Townsfolk who do so are poisoned until dusk. Each night*, choose 2 players: the first dies if a living Townsfolk performed a ritual today, otherwise both die. [Rituals still poison when you are not in play]

name: Ra ☀️
ability: Each night*, choose 2 players, they die and a player wakes and learns something true.
